meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the beginning
meanings.sent1: The initial step in the project was to gather materials.
meanings.sent2: The initial idea sparked a series of creative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The initial excitement of the party quickly faded as it started raining.
meanings.sent4: Her initial enthusiasm for the new job turned into disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The initial sunrise painted the sky with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The first letter of a name or word
meanings.sent1: Please write your initial on the top right corner of the page.
meanings.sent2: The company logo consists of the initials of the founders.
meanings.sent3: His initials spell out a funny acronym that always makes me smile.
meanings.sent4: The initials engraved on the tree trunk symbolized their everlasting love.
meanings.sent5: The royal seal bore the king's ornate initials.

meanings.definition: To mark or sign with one's initials
meanings.sent1: She will initial the contract before it gets finalized.
meanings.sent2: Remember to initial each page of the document for authentication.
meanings.sent3: He decided to initial the gift card to personalize it.
meanings.sent4: The artist would initial each painting to claim authorship.
meanings.sent5: Before mailing the letter, make sure to initial it for security purposes.
